featured.text: While it does have its share of resort hotels, shopping centers and good restaurants, and a smattering of museums, art galleries and night spots, its main attractions lie outdoors.
On a website of an art gallery.

definition.zh_def: 畫廊；展覽空間，通常用於展示藝術作品。
definition.en_def: A room or building for the display or sale of works of art.
definition.example: She visited the art gallery to see the new exhibition.
